## skateboard install

install skateboard

```
skateboard install [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force     Force install skateboard even if it already exists
  -h, --help      help for install
  -x, --no-deps   Don't install dependencies
  -t, --trucks    install trucks (default true)
```
